item.description:
Lost Marbles, the improv comedy troupe that features some of your incubators aka Sandy, Robin, Ben, Lisa, and Jason, comes back to ImprovBoston to rock out the Sgt. Culpepper Improv Jam.

The show starts at 7 p.m. and goes until 9 p.m. There are three acts that evening - Lost Marbles, an improv show called Tales From The Schlitz, and stand-up from our own Bari Olevsky. At 8:30 there will be an open improv jam where audience members can come up and join the improvisers on stage to play and try out improv. It'll be just like an incubator. Very relaxed and all fun. Come on out. Hope to see some of you there.

You have all been progressing as improvers, keep it up and take it up a notch!

Rock on!

Jason J.

Read more at the Sgt. Culpepper's Comedy Jam website for info and ticket purchasing:
http://improvboston.c...

ImprovBoston Theater
40 Prospect St., Central Square
Cambridge, MA

Tickets $10 / $7 for students and seniors
617-576-1253 for info and reservations
item.name: Lost Marbles rocking the Culpepper Jam again!!! Check it out Sunday at 7pm at IB
